name: Pixel Pirate (itch)
description:
X - Attack (Sword)

Z - Parry (Hook)

Hi

We are Seawolf Studios and this is our first game. 

We will be releasing on iOS and Android very soon where there will be additional features such as extra characters and weapons to unlock.

Any feedback you can give is greatly appreciated.

Find us on Facebook and Twitter for updates. 

Thanks for playing.

Good Luck!
